channel.title: ^v^Coding ALL Servers^v^ ^v^Helping ALL Problems^v^
channel.description:
Hi im ICEMAN21 Im putting this topic because over the past couple of days ive realized that the only topics that go on this forum are things like "Need a coder" or "HEEEELPPPP" or both. So i can consider myself sort of advanced in java coding so i think i should help everyone.
So if you have a problem here is the layout to post it on this thread: Name: Server: Server Source: Problem:
If you need a coder you can use this layout and if im not busy helping someone ill code like a couple of things for you. Heres the layout: Name: Server: Server Source: Codes:
So there you have it just use those layouts and ill get to you as soon as possible. ASAP!!!!
[br][size=1]Posted at: December 14, 2006, 09:46:40 AM[/size][hr]*grabs some pork rines* wtf is a pork rine
